MSGNO: 2184321
 
please propose for:-
 
MV JIN CHAO (63KDWT/'14) - PORT ELIZABETH – 28/31 AUG 2024

+

MV JIN CHAO (EX HANTON TRADER I)
63,469 MTS DWAT ON ABT 13.3M SSW, TPC 62.30 MT
BLT 2014, BULK CARRIER, HONG KONG FLAG, CLASS BV
LOA 199.90/BEAM 32.26 - 5 HO/HA, GT/NT 36,278/21,607
78,929 CBM GRAIN / 73,680 CBM BALE
4X35MTS CR + 4X12 CBM GRABS
S/C:
BALLAST - 14.0KTS(B) ON 29.5MT(B) + 0.1MT LSMGO 
LADEN - 13.0KTS(L) ON 28.5MT(L) IFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
ECO (WOG):
BALLAST - 13.0KTS(B) ON 23.5MT(B) + 0.1MT LSMGO
LADEN - 12.0KTS(L) ON 23.5MT(L) + 0.1MT LSMGO
IDLE: GE ABT 1.5 MT / BOILER ABT 2.0 MT + LSMGO 0.1 MT
WW: GE ABT 4.0 MT / BOILER ABT 2.0 MT + LSMGO 0.1 MT
ALL DTLS ABT

+ + +
thanks & regards
 
George Lemos
CTS Commercial
8 Cambridge Court | 210 Shepherds Bush Road | London | W6 7NJ | UK
